summary: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during World War II, his fiancée falls in love with the local Italian commander.
cast: Penélope Cruz|John Hurt|Christian Bale|Irene Papas|Gerasimos Skiadaressis|Aspasia Kralli|Mihalis Giannatos|Dimitris Kaberidis|Pietro Sarubbi|Viki Maragaki|Joanna-Daria Adraktas|Ira Tavlaridis|Katerina Didaskalou|Aimilios Heilakis|Nikos Karathanos|Antonis Antoniou|Giorgos Kotanidis|Tasos Palatzidis|Kostas Filippoglou|Froso Korrou|Maria-Louisa Papadopoulou|Dina Kafterani|Vlassis Zotis|Panos Thanassoulis|Alexia Bouloukou|Babis Artelaris|Gerasimos Iakovatos|Nikos Kalogiratos|Dionysis Karlis|Pavlos Lalis|Angelos Liberatos|Panagis Polichronatos|Christos Rangas|Dimitris Vandoros|Gerasimos Xidias|Dimitris Dimoulas|Pantelis Filipatos|Ilias Theofilatos|Makis Filipatos|Nicolas Cage|Piero Maggiò|Vincent Riotta|Roberto Citran|Federico Fioresi|Sandro Stefanini|Francesco Guzzo|Germano Di Mattia|Simone Spinazze|Sergio Albelli|Davide Quatraro|Paco Reconti|Nuccio Siano|Salvatore Lazzaro|Alessandro Repossi|Massimiliano Pazzaglia|Tim Hardy|Francesco Cabras|Nunzio Lombardo|Irini Eleftheriou|Sofia Yannioti|Marina Corelli|Evi Tzortzi|Leticia Moustaki|Angeliki Lambri|Maria Philipakopoulou|Irene Christidi|Giovanni Parricelli|Martin Robertson|Ben Gant|Paul Spong|Eddie Hession|Mike Pickering|Oren Marshall|David Morrissey|Patrick Malahide|Martin Glyn Murray|Till Bahlmann|Renny Krupinski|Peter Stark|Stephen Chang|Rhidian Bridge|Lucy Christofi Christy|Alex Zorbas
title: La mandolina del capitán Corelli
